resources.string: SCAN QR CODE PRINTED ON THE BACK OF YOUR DEVICE
Did not get email?\nResend code to xyz
Download and install the Google Home App
Add the Oakter Smart Home Action in the xyz section of abc.

You can change the name of your Switch to something unique, like Bedroom Light, Night Lamp etc to remember them easily and for easy voice control. 
If you have already linked your account to Alexa or Google Assistant, you need to say - 

“Alexa, discover devices”
or
“Hey Google, Sync my devices” 

- before you stat using your new name with Alexa or Google Assistant
